tooltips.label: Is there anyone other than you dependent on your income?
tooltips.labelTool: A dependant is anyone who is wholly or partially dependant on your income.

tooltips.label: Income details
tooltips.labelTool: If you are unsure of your after-tax income but know your gross income, head to www.paye.net.nz/calculator/ to calculate

tooltips.label: Other than the joint applicant, is there anyone else dependent on your income?
tooltips.labelTool: A dependant is anyone who is wholly or partially dependant on your income.

tooltips.label: Are you aware of any reason or potential event/occurrence over the next year that is likely to significantly increase your expenses?
tooltips.labelTool: For example, you’re expecting an increase in dependents

tooltips.label: Are your combined expenses likely to change in the next 12 months?
tooltips.labelTool: If you have (for example) a ‘debt spreading’ arrangement for a car loan or are paying off a large purchase in instalments, we’ll want to account for this when verifying your expenses.

tooltips.label: Do you have a loan or other financial product where you are required to make one or more lump sum payments (instead of, or in addition to, your regular payments)? Please exclude any buy-now-pay-later facilities.
tooltips.labelTool: An example of a lump sum payment is a balloon payment on a car loan

tooltips.label: Loan balance:
tooltips.labelTool: Please ensure you have captured the total loan amount that you are applying for. We will confirm the final structure of the loan a bit later.

tooltips.label: Loan amount:
tooltips.labelTool: Please ensure you have captured the total loan amount that you are applying for. We will confirm the final structure of the loan a bit later.

tooltips.label: Total interest:
tooltips.labelTool: Calculations are based on the interest rate(s) selected being constant for the entire term of the loan(s).

tooltips.label: Desired revolving credit limit
tooltips.labelTool: Interest is charged at the end of each month on any funds drawn from the account and added to your unpaid balance.

tooltips.label: DisclosedUIRatio
tooltips.labelTool: Enter decimal more than 0.1 for premium customer, or less than 0.1 for non-premium customer

tooltips.label: Is the property a standalone, single section house, or a terraced house / townhouse?
tooltips.labelTool:
A standalone house is a freestanding residential building.

A terraced / townhouse is a property that shares its walls (or a wall) with its neighbours, but does not have other properties below or above it like apartments do.

tooltips.label: essential living expenses
tooltips.labelTool: An expense is essential if it’s necessary for you and/or your family to maintain a reasonable standard of living

Verification_Method.name: Verification_Method

options.name: Bank statement retrieval
options.sublabel: Click next, and you will be prompted to securely enter your banking credentials for one-time use by Heartland to digitally verify your last 90 days of bank statements. Login credentials are not stored. Learn more about bank statement retrieval.

options.name: Upload statements manually
options.sublabel: Choose this if you'd prefer to manually upload 90 days of bank statements from all accounts. Please first check the list of accepted accounts and note this option often means a longer approval process.

Verification_Method.label: How would you like to verify your income and expenses?

Complete_Verification_Now.name: Complete_Verification_Now
Complete_Verification_Now.sublabel: Would you like to complete income verification now or later?

Verification_Link_Primary.name: Verification_Link_Primary
Verification_Link_Primary.sublabel: How would you like to receive your link?

Verification_Link_CoApp.name: Verification_Link_CoApp
Verification_Link_CoApp.sublabel: How would they like to receive their link?

default.Type: Council rates, body corporate fees and resident society fees
Doctor, dental and other medical costs

Any other regular or frequent expenses? Please tell us about any other regular or frequent expenses that you are unwilling to give up after entering into the loan e.g. tithing, donations, gambling and/or payments to family or friends

Disclosed_Discretionary_Other_Details.name: Disclosed_Discretionary_Other_Details
Disclosed_Discretionary_Other_Details.label: If you entered an amount in 'Other', please outline the expense.

Expense_TotalLoans_Hp_OtherDebt.name: Expense_TotalLoans_Hp_OtherDebt
Expense_TotalLoans_Hp_OtherDebt.subLabel: Include the total amount you owe on any loans, hire purchases and other debt. You don’t need to include overdrafts or credit cards here.

Expense_Any_Creditcard_Overdraft_Other_D.name: Expense_Any_Creditcard_Overdraft_Other_Debts
Expense_Any_Creditcard_Overdraft_Other_D.label: Do you have any loans, hire purchases or other debt (not including credit cards, overdrafts, student loans, or buy now pay later)?

Expense_Any_Creditcard_Storecard_Overdra.label: Do you have any financial products, such as credit cards or overdrafts?

NewHomeBuyer.name: NewHomeBuyer
NewHomeBuyer.label: Will this be your first time buying a property, either in New Zealand or overseas?

SupportingComments.name: SupportingComments
SupportingComments.label: If you answered yes to any of the above, or if there is anything else we should know about your ability to repay your home loan in the future, please provide details and information supporting your application below.

SupportingCommentsExpenses.name: SupportingCommentsExpenses
SupportingCommentsExpenses.label: If you have entered $0 for any of the above questions, or there is anything else you would like to tell us about your expenses, please use the following comments box.

IncomeQuestionsExplanation.name: IncomeQuestionsExplanation
IncomeQuestionsExplanation.label: Please explain any of your answers to these questions below.

Confirm_To_Provide_All_Statements.name: Confirm_To_Provide_All_Statements
Confirm_To_Provide_All_Statements.label: Please confirm that you understand that you must provide us with statements from all accounts (including any credit cards) into which your income or expenses are paid.

Accepted_Additional_Refinance_Costs.name: Accepted_Additional_Refinance_Costs
Accepted_Additional_Refinance_Costs.label: By ticking this box, I acknowledge and accept that additional costs, such as break fees, may be payable to my current home loan provider if I refinance with Heartland.

RefinanceExistingRateType.name: RefinanceExistingRateType
RefinanceExistingRateType.label: Are you on a fixed rate or floating rate with your current mortgage provider?

RefinanceExistingFixedTermEndDate.label: When does your fixed term end?

Own_Investment_Property.name: Own_Investment_Property
Own_Investment_Property.label: Do you own an investment or rental property?
